titles.title: A joint resolution designating May 25, 1987 as a "National Day of Remembrance" of the U.S. crew members killed and injured in the attack on the USS STARK.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 12/21/1987--Introduced. Designates May 25, 1987, as a National Day of Remembrance of the U.S. crew members killed and injured in the attack on the U.S.S. Stark.
